backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor that integrates blob storage, access control, and user approval modules, exposing endpoints for user approval workflows and user profile management with role-based authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four registration navigation fixes for different roles (Participant, Provider, Guardian, Plan Manager) to redirect users to their respective dashboards after completing RegistrationPage.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including App.tsx with TanStack Router, role-based dashboards with Kenyan-localized data, authentication components, layout components, and various UI cards for participants, guardians, providers, and plan managers.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements like backgrounds, borders, cards, and charts using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with title 'NEXY_MYNDIS CONCIERGE' and a root div that loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with TanStack Router setup, role-based dashboard routing logic (DashboardRouter), OnboardingFlow overlay with z-index 60, and route definitions for landing, registration, dashboards, and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/AIMetricsO: React component displaying AI agent metrics in a grid of cards showing validation accuracy, false positive/negative rates, average processing time, and confidence scores with formatted percentages and target thresholds.
frontend/src/components/admin/ThresholdC: Admin panel for configuring AI validation thresholds including budget warning levels (75%, 90%, 100%), anomaly sensitivity, and compliance strictness with save/reset functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout, clears query cache and local storage on logout, and displays appropriate loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Deprecated profile setup dialog for collecting user name and email during onboarding; preserved for reference but no longer actively used in the application flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleSelecto: Onboarding component that displays role selection cards (NDIS Participant, Guardian/Carer, Service Provider, Plan Manager) and assigns the selected role to the authenticated user.
frontend/src/components/booking/AIBookin: Displays AI-generated booking estimates including duration, total cost, and budget impact analysis showing category, remaining budget, and percentage used.
frontend/src/components/booking/AIServic: Shows AI-recommended services with descriptions, pricing, budget fit scores (Excellent/Good/Fair), and goal alignment percentages for NDIS participants.
frontend/src/components/booking/AITimeSl: Presents AI-recommended time slots with confidence scores, reasoning explanations, and selection buttons for booking appointments.
frontend/src/components/common/DemoModeB: Empty component file, likely intended for displaying a demo mode indicator badge.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSk: Reusable skeleton loader component with customizable width, height, and shimmer animation for placeholder content during data loading.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSt: Loading indicator with timeout handling that displays a spinner initially and shows a refresh button if loading exceeds the specified timeout duration.
frontend/src/components/common/PageTrans: Wrapper component that applies fade-in and slide-up animation effects to page content during navigation transitions.
frontend/src/components/common/ScrollRev: Intersection Observer-based component that animates children with fade-in and slide-up effects when they scroll into viewport with configurable threshold.
frontend/src/components/common/Validatio: A modal dialog component that displays detailed AI budget validation results, including transaction details, approval/rejection status, reasons for rejection, and warnings with appropriate icons and styling.
frontend/src/components/guardian/AIBudge: Card component displaying AI-generated budget predictions including depletion forecast date, current spending rate, and recommendations for budget management.
frontend/src/components/guardian/AIPrior: Card component showing AI-prioritized participants with urgency levels (high/medium/low), reasons for priority, and action buttons for each participant.
frontend/src/components/guardian/AIRiskA: Card component displaying AI risk assessments for participants with risk levels, contributing factors, and recommendations, styled with color-coded indicators.
frontend/src/components/invoice/AIComple: Card component that displays a checklist of invoice completeness criteria with pass/fail indicators for invoice validation.
frontend/src/components/invoice/AILineIt: Card component showing AI-suggested line items for invoices (therapy sessions) with descriptions, quantities, prices, and buttons to add them to the invoice.
frontend/src/components/invoice/AIPricin: Inline validation component that checks if a service price is within NDIS guidelines and displays appropriate success or warning messages.
frontend/src/components/landing/DemoVide: Landing page section with a clickable video thumbnail that opens a modal to display a platform demo video.
frontend/src/components/landing/FeatureC: Enhanced feature card with 3D mouse tilt effects on hover, displaying an icon, title, and description with gradient styling and animations.
frontend/src/components/landing/Floating: Animated background component that renders floating particles with mouse-following physics, including velocity, damping, and return-to-base behavior (disabled on touch devices and reduced motion preferences).
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroPart: Canvas-based animated particle system with connections between nearby particles. Respects prefers-reduced-motion by rendering static particles instead of animating.
frontend/src/components/landing/RippleBu: Button component with ripple click effect that creates expanding circles at click position. Manages ripple lifecycle with automatic cleanup after 300ms.
frontend/src/components/landing/Testimon: Auto-rotating testimonial carousel with manual navigation dots and pause-on-hover. Uses custom useCarousel hook for state management and smooth transitions between testimonial cards.
frontend/src/components/landing/TrustInd: Statistics section displaying NDIS metrics with animated count-up effects. Uses intersection observer to trigger animations when scrolled into view with staggered delays.
frontend/src/components/landing/VideoMod: Full-screen modal overlay for video playback with close button and backdrop click handling. Currently displays placeholder content instead of actual video embed.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer with four columns: brand info, quick links, legal links, and contact/social media. Features gradient background and hover effects on links.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Fixed header with responsive navigation, role-based dashboard links, and mobile menu. Integrates authentication state and LoginButton component.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Main layout wrapper component that combines Header, Footer, and content area with optional page title. Provides consistent spacing and gradient background.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Compl: Displays the final onboarding screen with a success message, recommended next steps (upload plan, review budget, search providers, book appointment), and a button to navigate to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Featu: Shows key platform features (upload plan, find providers, book services) with icons and descriptions, includes a tip to upload NDIS plan, and provides skip/finish buttons.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/NDISB: Educational screen explaining NDIS plan fundamentals including what an NDIS plan is, budget categories, service providers, and plan management concepts with skip/continue navigation.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Manages the multi-step onboarding flow with progress tracking, rendering WelcomeScreen, NDISBasicsScreen, FeatureDemoScreen, and CompletionScreen in sequence with step navigation.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Welco: Initial onboarding screen welcoming users to NEXY MYNDIS, displaying four key features (manage plan, find providers, track goals, stay compliant) in a grid layout with skip/start buttons.
frontend/src/components/participant/AIIn: Displays AI-generated budget insights with different types (warning, opportunity, suggestion) using color-coded cards with icons and descriptions from fake AI data utility.
frontend/src/components/participant/AIMi: Shows AI-generated milestone alerts with priority levels (high, medium, low), displaying days until milestone, action items, and color-coded priority indicators.
frontend/src/components/participant/AIPr: Renders AI-matched provider recommendations with match scores, specialties, availability, and reasoning, with clickable cards that navigate to the providers page.
frontend/src/components/participant/Budg: Displays a participant's budget health status with overall utilization percentage, color-coded health indicators (critical/warning/healthy), and a list of active budget threshold alerts.
Shows a summary card of an NDIS plan's budget including total allocated, spent, and remaining amounts with a visual progress bar and warning alert when utilization exceeds 80%.

Renders validation results for budget changes with color-coded alerts (success/warning/error), displaying reasons for rejection, warnings, predicted depletion dates, and collapsible recommended adjustments.
frontend/src/components/participant/Goal: Displays NDIS plan goals with visual progress bars showing completion percentage for each goal in a card layout.
frontend/src/components/participant/Plan: Shows an overview of an NDIS plan including plan number, status badge, start/end dates, and a list of goals with truncation for longer lists.
frontend/src/components/participant/Upco: Lists upcoming service bookings with details like service type, provider, date/time, status badge, and price in a card format.
frontend/src/components/planmanager/AICo: Displays AI-generated compliance metrics including an overall compliance score, number of monitored audit areas, and a list of recent compliance checks with results.
frontend/src/components/planmanager/AIIn: Displays AI-generated invoice recommendations with confidence scores, participant details, and action buttons (approve, request info, review) using fake data.
frontend/src/components/planmanager/AIPo: Shows AI portfolio optimization opportunities with impact levels (High/Medium/Low), descriptions, and potential savings using color-coded cards.
frontend/src/components/provider/AIBooki: Displays AI-generated optimal booking time slots and optimization suggestions to help providers maximize scheduling efficiency.
frontend/src/components/provider/AIClien: Shows AI demand forecast for the next 30 days with predicted bookings per service, trends (up/stable), and recommendations.
frontend/src/components/provider/AICompa: Renders a small badge with a random AI compatibility score (75-98%) displayed with a star icon and color-coded by score range.
Displays AI compatibility analysis with top factors shown as percentage scores and descriptive insights with checkmarks.
frontend/src/components/provider/AIFilte: Shows AI-generated filter suggestions with relevance badges (High/Medium/Low) and reasons to help users refine search criteria.
frontend/src/components/provider/AIReven: Displays AI revenue forecast with current month revenue, growth metrics, top service performance, and key insights.
frontend/src/components/provider/Anomaly: Shows a dismissible warning banner when AI detects anomalies in invoices, listing detected issues with an alert icon.
frontend/src/components/provider/Provide: Renders a service provider card with details (name, rating, services, location), AI compatibility badge, and a 'Book Now' button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, with query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCarousel.ts: Custom hook providing carousel functionality with auto-advance, manual navigation (next/prev/goTo), and pause/resume controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountUp.ts: React hook that animates a number from 0 to a target value over a specified duration using an easeOutCubic easing function and requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, providing login/logout functionality, identity management, and authentication status tracking with AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntersectionObserv: React hook that uses IntersectionObserver API to detect when a referenced element enters or exits the viewport based on configurable threshold and rootMargin options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMouseTilt.ts: React hook that applies 3D tilt effect to an element based on mouse position, with smooth transitions and automatic reset on mouse leave (disabled on touch devices).
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: React hook that creates a parallax scrolling effect by translating an element vertically based on scroll position and a configurable speed multiplier (respects prefers-reduced-motion).
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, and NDIS-related data (participants, providers, bookings, budgets). Includes implemented backend queries for user/role management and mock implementations for features not yet in backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: React hook that wraps useGetCallerUserRole to provide convenient role checking functions (isParticipant, isGuardian, isProvider, isPlanManager, isAdmin) with loading states.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind imports, custom CSS variables for theming (light/dark modes), typography styles using Inter and Poppins fonts, and accessibility focus utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAIAgentDashboard: Admin-only page for monitoring AI agent performance metrics and configuring thresholds, displaying AIMetricsOverview and ThresholdConfigurationPanel components with access control.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Service booking page with form for scheduling appointments with providers, including AI-powered time slot recommendations, service suggestions, and cost estimation (currently using mock data).
frontend/src/pages/GetStartedPage.tsx: Role selection page that displays four NDIS role options (Participant, Guardian, Provider, Plan Manager) with features and icons, redirecting authenticated users to the appropriate registration flow.
frontend/src/pages/GuardianDashboard.tsx: Guardian dashboard displaying overview stats, managed participants list, and AI-powered components for budget predictions, priority participants, and risk assessments.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceCreatePage.tsx: Invoice creation form for service providers with dynamic line items, AI-powered suggestions for pricing validation, and completeness checking before submission.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with animated hero section, parallax effects, floating particles, lazy-loaded testimonials and demo video, redirecting authenticated users based on their role.
Participant dashboard showing NDIS plan overview, budget summary, goal progress, upcoming bookings, and AI-powered insights including milestone alerts and provider recommendations.
Plan manager dashboard displaying portfolio statistics, managed participant portfolios, and AI components for compliance monitoring, invoice recommendations, and portfolio optimization.
frontend/src/pages/PlanUploadPage.tsx: Page component for uploading NDIS plan PDFs with file selection, progress tracking, and navigation to dashboard upon successful upload using ExternalBlob for file handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProviderDashboard.tsx: Provider-specific dashboard displaying revenue analytics, booking optimization, client needs prediction, anomaly warnings, and business statistics with mock Kenyan-localized data.
frontend/src/pages/ProvidersPage.tsx: Page for browsing and searching service providers with filtering by service type, AI compatibility insights, and mock Kenyan provider data including locations and contact details.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Multi-step registration form handling participant, guardian, provider, and plan manager roles with progress tracking and profile creation via Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/types/mock-types.ts: TypeScript type definitions for NDIS plans, bookings, budget validation, AI metrics, and alerts with Kenyan localization, representing features not yet implemented in backend.
frontend/src/utils/fakeAIData.ts: Generator functions producing mock AI-driven data including insights, milestone alerts, provider recommendations, risk assessments, and priority participants with Kenyan context for UI development.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, typography, spacing, border radius, shadows, and container settings with responsive breakpoints.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking a fix request for broken registration completion flows across all user roles (participant, provider, guardian, plan manager) with navigation redirection issues.
